text: Ezɨ kɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn tiarir mam barazi, a kamagh mɨgei, “Nɨ akam kamaghɨn an osirigh. Datɨrɨghɨn ikɨ mangɨ, gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Ekiamɨn ikia egh gɨn ovengamiba, me bar akongegh.” Ezɨ Godɨn Duam uaghan ghaze, “Bar guizbangɨra. Me amir ingangarir osɨmtɨzir kam ategh, egh mangɨ avughsɨ. Egh me pura mangan kogham. Puvatɨ. Arazir aghuir me amiziba men gɨn mangɨtɨ God kotiamɨn dar ganam. Kamagh amizɨ, me bar akongegh.”
